entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as having left the school unprotected during his absences this year.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is also a mentor to Harry. He is mentioned as being in charge of the school's protection.

relationships.description: Harry is asked by Dumbledore if he wants to accompany him tonight, and Harry agrees. This establishes a relationship between the two characters.
Dumbledore tells Harry that he must obey any command given by Dumbledore at once, without question. This establishes a power dynamic between the two characters.
